Christmas Present, Easter Egg & Jack-O'-Lantern: S-Rank Weapon Generator [Ralf]
203501CC 7C7E1B78
063501D0 00000068
83FE00F0 807E00D8
4BDB064D 38610008
3C808035 6084022C
38A000ww 4BDBC81D
38610008 4BDBC74D
2C030001 4082008C
386000ss 9861000A
7FE3FB78 38810008
4BE68FE1 2C030000
40810070 7FE3FB78
38810008 4BE68279
48000060 iijjkkll
mmnnoopp 00000000
E2000001 80008000

ww = S-Rank Weapon ID

70 - SABER
71 - SWORD
72 - BLADE
73 - PARTISAN
74 - SLICER
75 - GUN
76 - RIFLE
77 - MECHGUN
78 - SHOT
79 - CANE
7A - ROD
7B - WAND
7C - TWIN
7D - CLAW
7E - BAZOOKA
7F - NEEDLE
80 - SCYTHE
81 - HAMMER
82 - MOON
83 - PSYCHOGUN
84 - PUNCH
85 - WINDMILL
86 - HARISEN
87 - KATANA
88 - J-CUTTER
A5 - SWORDS
A6 - LAUNCHER
A7 - CARDS
A8 - KNUCKLE
A9 - AXE


ss = S-Rank Weapon Special

00 - None
01 - Jellen
02 - Zalure
03 - HP Restoration
04 - TP Restoration
05 - Burning
06 - Tempest
07 - Blizzard
08 - Arrest
09 - Chaos
0A - Hell
0B - Spirit
0C - Berserk
0D - Demon's
0E - Gush
0F - Geist
10 - King's


S-Rank Weapon Name

ii = Character 1
jj = Character 2
kk = Character 3
ll = Character 4
mm = Character 5
nn = Character 6
oo = Character 7
pp = Character 8


Characters

00 - None
41 - A
42 - B
43 - C
44 - D
45 - E
46 - F
47 - G
48 - H
49 - I
4A - J
4B - K
4C - L
4D - M
4E - N
4F - O
50 - P
51 - Q
52 - R
53 - S
54 - T
55 - U
56 - V
57 - W
58 - X
59 - Y
5A - Z
